price: We inspired Moses, “Leave with My slaves by night; you will surely be pursued.”
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
